question: You went to another city for a training course and stayed at a friend’s house for a week. They have been great hosts.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,thank them for having you at their house for a weekexpress your gratitude for their hospitalitysay how much you miss them
text: I hope you and your family are healthy and fine. I writing this letter to express great thanks to all your family, where I spend one week with happiness. I felt that there was no difference between you and me, they give me abundant love and blessings.

I never forget those seven days, when I stayed in Shimla at your home for my web designing course, which was fruitful for my bright future. We spend the last two days in a hilly station with all members of your family. We enjoyed a "Nation Zoo" where I went the first time and saw different animals. After coming home, we played ludo and antakshri, which will memorable incident in my life.

I am thankful to your mother, who prepared my favourite dishes ,especially pizza with vegetable ingredients. Your father is an intelligent person, who gave me more knowledge about my training course, which is helpful in my course. He explained to me about the surrounding areas of Shimla as well as told me the history of that place.
I really miss all of you and your hospitality. Never forget those memorised incidents. I hope that next time we will go  with together another place and invite  all members to my home.
I am very thankful to all of you. We will in touch all life.
